Symbol.Script_3D:
! Cable Ladder Cross
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN gs_CableTrayMat = sMat
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL gs_CableTrayMat
! ! ---------------------- ! ! ! --- object rotator --- ! ! ! ---------------------- ! ! !IF rot_conn THEN ! ! IF rot_conn = 1 THEN ! dist_x = gs_Connections[3][1]+gs_Connections[3][23]*gs_Connections[3][4] ! dist_y = gs_Connections[3][2] ! ELSE ! DIM inCoords[20][3] ! DIM outCoords[20][3] ! ! DIM cMatrix[3][3] ! ! cMatrix[1][1] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][4] ! cMatrix[1][2] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][5] ! cMatrix[1][3] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][6] ! ! cMatrix[2][1] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][7] ! cMatrix[2][2] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][8] ! cMatrix[2][3] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][9] ! ! cMatrix[3][1] = -cMatrix[2][2]*cMatrix[1][3]+cMatrix[2][3]*cMatrix[1][2] ! cMatrix[3][2] = -cMatrix[2][3]*cMatrix[1][1]+cMatrix[2][1]*cMatrix[1][3] ! cMatrix[3][3] = -cMatrix[2][1]*cMatrix[1][2]+cMatrix[2][2]*cMatrix[1][1] ! ! ! DIM tMatrix[3][3] ! ! tMatrix[1][1] = cMatrix[1][1] ! tMatrix[1][2] = cMatrix[2][1] ! tMatrix[1][3] = cMatrix[3][1] ! ! tMatrix[2][1] = cMatrix[1][2] ! tMatrix[2][2] = cMatrix[2][2] ! tMatrix[2][3] = cMatrix[3][2] ! ! tMatrix[3][1] = cMatrix[1][3] ! tMatrix[3][2] = cMatrix[2][3] ! tMatrix[3][3] = cMatrix[3][3] ! ! ! !!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!! ! ! cx = gs_Connections[rot_conn][1]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][4] ! cy = gs_Connections[rot_conn][2]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][5] ! cz = gs_Connections[rot_conn][3]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][6] ! ! PUT cx, cy, cz ! ! Coordinates = NSP/3 ! ! FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates ! inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) ! inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) ! inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) ! NEXT cnum ! ! ! ! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates ! ! FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates ! outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] ! outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] ! outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] ! NEXT cnum ! ! dist_x = outCoords[1][1] ! dist_y = outCoords[1][2] ! ENDIF ! ! CALL "MEP_m_object_rotator" PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn, ! MEP_Position = MEP_Position, ! dist_x = dist_x, ! dist_y = dist_y, ! Rotation = Rotation, ! symbRotangle = SYMB_ROTANGLE, ! gs_Connections = gs_Connections, ! MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, ! MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, ! MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData, ! defaultMatrix = defaultMatrix !ENDIF
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
HOTSPOT MEP_StraightLength/2, 0, 0, 100
mainTangentLen = MEP_StraightLength/2-ConWidth_3/2-MEP_CrossRadius branchTangentLen_3 = ConLength_3-MEP_CrossRadius branchTangentLen_4 = ConLength_4-MEP_CrossRadius
IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN ADDz -cableTrayHalfHeight
mm = 15 GOSUB 10
PRISM_ NSP/3, cableTrayHeight,
GET (NSP)
DEL 1 ELSE IF MEP_cline_show_3D THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! LIN_ 0, 0, 0, MEP_StraightLength, 0, 0 LIN_ MEP_StraightLength/2, 0, 0, MEP_StraightLength/2, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength_3, 0 LIN_ MEP_StraightLength/2, 0, 0, MEP_StraightLength/2, -cableTrayHalfWidth-ConLength_4, 0 ENDIF
IF cable_carrier_show THEN IF MEP_CoveredCableTray THEN ! -----> upper plane <----- MULz 1-2*(ABS(MEP_EmptySideID - 3) < EPS) mm = 1 GOSUB 10 ADDz cableTrayHalfHeight POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP) DEL 2 ENDIF
MULz 1-2*(ABS(MEP_EmptySideID - 3) < EPS) ADDz -cableTrayHalfHeight ladderNum = MAX(4, INT(MEP_StraightLength/(0.75*ConWidth_1))) ladderDist = MEP_StraightLength/ladderNum ladderHalfDist = ladderDist/2 ladderThk = MAX(0.03*(ladderDist > 0.06), (0.75*ConWidth_1)/10) FOR i = 1 TO ladderNum ! -----> main ladders <----- ! ADDx ladderHalfDist+ladderDist*(i-1) PUT ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT -ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT -ladderThk/2, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT ladderThk/2, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, -1
POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1 NEXT i DEL 2
branchTangentLen = branchTangentLen_3 ConLength = ConLength_3 ConWidth = ConWidth_3 cableTrayHalfWidthBC = cableTrayHalfWidthB FOR k = 1 TO 2 ladderNum = MAX(1.5, INT(ConLength/(0.75*ConWidth))+0.5) ladderDist = ConLength/ladderNum ladderNum = INT(ladderNum) ladderThk = MAX(0.03*(ladderDist > 0.06), (0.75*ConWidth)/10)
MULy 1-2*(k-1) MULz 1-2*(ABS(MEP_EmptySideID - 3) < EPS) ADDz -cableTrayHalfHeight FOR j = 1 TO 2 ADDx MEP_StraightLength*(j-1) MULx 1-2*(j-1) IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN mm = 15 GOSUB 20 ELSE mm = 15 GOSUB 30 ENDIF PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength, 15
CUTPOLYA NSP/3, 2, 0,
GET(NSP) DEL 2 NEXT j
FOR j = 1 TO ladderNum+1 ! -----> branch ladders <----- ! ADDy cableTrayHalfWidth+ladderDist*(j-1) PUT EPS, 0, 1 PUT EPS, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength-EPS, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength-EPS, 0, 1 PUT EPS, 0, -1
POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP) DEL 1 NEXT j
CUTEND CUTEND DEL 2
ADDz -cableTrayHalfHeight FOR j = 1 TO 2 ! -----> sides <----- ! ADDx MEP_StraightLength*(j-1) MULx 1-2*(j-1) IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN mm = 1 GOSUB 20
mm = cableTrayHeight GOSUB 20 ELSE mm = 0 GOSUB 30
mm = cableTrayHeight GOSUB 30 ENDIF
RULED NSP/6, 16+32,
GET(NSP) DEL 2 NEXT j branchTangentLen = branchTangentLen_4 ConLength = ConLength_4 ConWidth = ConWidth_4 cableTrayHalfWidthBC = cableTrayHalfWidthC DEL 2 NEXT k
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=0, ConShow_1 = 0, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3 = 0, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConShow_4 = 0, ConEdit_4 = 1 ENDIF ENDIF DEL 1 BODY -1
END
10: IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO CrossRes+1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB+MEP_CrossRadius*(SIN(alpha)-1), cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius*(1-COS(alpha)), mm alpha = alpha + 90/CrossRes NEXT i PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius+branchTangentLen_3, mm
PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius+branchTangentLen_3, mm alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO CrossRes+1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB+MEP_CrossRadius*(1-COS(alpha)), cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius*(1-SIN(alpha)), mm alpha = alpha + 90/CrossRes NEXT i PUT MEP_StraightLength, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm
PUT MEP_StraightLength, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO CrossRes+1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC+MEP_CrossRadius*(1-SIN(alpha)), -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius*(1-COS(alpha)), mm alpha = alpha + 90/CrossRes NEXT i PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius-branchTangentLen_4, mm
PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius-branchTangentLen_4, mm alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO CrossRes+1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC+MEP_CrossRadius*(COS(alpha)-1), -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius*(1-SIN(alpha)), mm alpha = alpha + 90/CrossRes NEXT i PUT 0, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm ELSE PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength_3, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength_3, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-ConLength_4, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-ConLength_4, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT 0, -cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm ENDIF RETURN
20: PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO CrossRes+1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC+MEP_CrossRadius*(SIN(alpha)-1), cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius*(1-COS(alpha)), mm alpha = alpha + 90/CrossRes NEXT i PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius+branchTangentLen, mm RETURN
30: PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, cableTrayHalfWidth, mm PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength, mm RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Cable Ladder Cross
CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN SET FILL gs_fill_type
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[13][1], outCoords[13][2], HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds HOTLINE2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2] HOTLINE2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], outCoords[13][1], outCoords[13][2] HOTLINE2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], outCoords[13][1], outCoords[13][2]
IF ABS(ABS(dZz)-1) > EPS THEN HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], hceID_2 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], hceID_3 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], hceID_4 ENDIF DEL 1
IF ABS(ABS(dZz)-1) < EPS THEN mainTangentLen = MEP_StraightLength/2-ConWidth_3/2-MEP_CrossRadius branchTangentLen_3 = ConLength_3-MEP_CrossRadius branchTangentLen_4 = ConLength_4-MEP_CrossRadius
aa = MEP_Position[2][1] bb = MEP_Position[2][2]
arCosVal = aa/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 alpha = ACS(arCosVal) IF SGN(bb) = -1 THEN alpha = 360-alpha
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 alpha MUL2 1, SGN(dZz)
ladderNum = MAX(4, INT(MEP_StraightLength/(0.75*ConWidth_1))) ladderDist = MEP_StraightLength/ladderNum ladderHalfDist = ladderDist/2 ladderThk = MAX(0.03*(ladderDist > 0.06), (0.75*ConWidth_1)/10) FOR i = 1 TO ladderNum ! -----> main ladders <----- ! ADD2 ladderHalfDist+ladderDist*(i-1), 0 PUT ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT -ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT -ladderThk/2, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT ladderThk/2, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT ladderThk/2, cableTrayHalfWidth, -1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
DEL 1 NEXT i
branchTangentLen = branchTangentLen_3 ConLength = ConLength_3 ConWidth = ConWidth_3 cableTrayHalfWidthBC = cableTrayHalfWidthB FOR k = 1 TO 2 MUL2 1, 1-2*(k-1)
ladderNum = MAX(1.5, INT(ConLength_3/(0.75*ConWidth_3))+0.5) ladderDist = ConLength_3/ladderNum ladderNum = INT(ladderNum) ladderThk = MAX(0.03*(ladderDist > 0.06), (0.75*ConWidth_3)/10)
IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN ! -----> branch ladders <----- ! FOR i = 1 TO ladderNum+1 ADD2 0, cableTrayHalfWidth+ladderDist*(i-1)
IF ladderDist*(i-1)+ladderThk > MEP_CrossRadius THEN PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthBC, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, -1 ELSE xx = cableTrayHalfWidthBC+MEP_CrossRadius-SQR(MEP_CrossRadius^2 - (MEP_CrossRadius-ladderDist*(i-1))^2) xx2 = cableTrayHalfWidthBC+MEP_CrossRadius-SQR(MEP_CrossRadius^2 - (MEP_CrossRadius-ladderDist*(i-1)-ladderThk)^2)
PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-xx, 0, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC-MEP_CrossRadius, MEP_CrossRadius-ladderDist*(i-1), 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-xx2, ladderThk, 3001 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+xx2, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthBC+MEP_CrossRadius, MEP_CrossRadius-ladderDist*(i-1), 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+xx, 0, 3001 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-xx, 0, -1 ENDIF
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
DEL 1 NEXT i ELSE FOR i = 1 TO ladderNum+1 ADD2 0, cableTrayHalfWidth+ladderDist*(i-1) PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthBC, ladderThk, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthBC, 0, -1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP) DEL 1 NEXT i ENDIF DEL 1
branchTangentLen = branchTangentLen_4 ConLength = ConLength_4 ConWidth = ConWidth_4 cableTrayHalfWidthBC = cableTrayHalfWidthC NEXT k
IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB-MEP_CrossRadius, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB-MEP_CrossRadius, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius, 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius, 3001 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius+branchTangentLen_3, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius+branchTangentLen_3, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB+MEP_CrossRadius, cableTrayHalfWidth+MEP_CrossRadius, 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB+MEP_CrossRadius, cableTrayHalfWidth, 3001 PUT MEP_StraightLength, cableTrayHalfWidth, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC+MEP_CrossRadius, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC+MEP_CrossRadius, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius, 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius, 3001 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius-branchTangentLen_4, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius-branchTangentLen_4, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC-MEP_CrossRadius, -cableTrayHalfWidth-MEP_CrossRadius, 901 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC-MEP_CrossRadius, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 3001 PUT 0, -cableTrayHalfWidth, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 ELSE PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength_3, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth+ConLength_3, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthB, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength, cableTrayHalfWidth, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2+cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-ConLength_4, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth-ConLength_4, 1 PUT MEP_StraightLength/2-cableTrayHalfWidthC, -cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 PUT 0, -cableTrayHalfWidth, MEP_CoveredCableTray PUT 0, cableTrayHalfWidth, 1 ENDIF
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1 + 2*MEP_CoveredCableTray + 4 + 64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 0, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 0, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3 = 0, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConShow_4 = 0, ConEdit_4 = 1
DEL 3 ELSE PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS cable_carrier_show = 1, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS cable_carrier_show = 1, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ENDIF
IF MEP_cline_show THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! PEN MEP_cline_pen SET LINE_TYPE MEP_cline_type
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] LINE2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2] LINE2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2] DEL 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Cable Ladder Cross
EPS = 0.00001
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300 hceID_4 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+400
DIM CrossTypeStr_dim[2] CrossTypeStr_dim[1] = `Радиус` CrossTypeStr_dim[2] = `Со Скосом`
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "MEP_CrossType" THEN FOR i = 1 TO 2 IF MEP_CrossType = CrossTypeStr_dim[i] THEN MEP_CrossTypeID = i PARAMETERS MEP_CrossTypeID = MEP_CrossTypeID i = 2 ENDIF NEXT i ENDIF IF MEP_CrossType <> CrossTypeStr_dim[MEP_CrossTypeID] THEN MEP_CrossType = CrossTypeStr_dim[MEP_CrossTypeID] PARAMETERS MEP_CrossType = MEP_CrossType ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN CrossRes = 12 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN CrossRes = 2 ENDIF
! ------------------ ! ! --- Properties --- ! ! ------------------ !
cableTrayWidth = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] cableTrayWidthB = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] cableTrayHeight = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] cableTrayHalfWidth = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2 cableTrayHalfWidthB = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12]/2 cableTrayHalfWidthC = MEP_NumConnectionData[4][12]/2 cableTrayHalfHeight = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2 PUT gs_Connections[2][4], gs_Connections[2][5], gs_Connections[2][6] PUT gs_Connections[2][7], gs_Connections[2][8], gs_Connections[2][9]
PUT ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3+ConLength_3, ConPosZ_3 PUT gs_Connections[3][4], gs_Connections[3][5], gs_Connections[3][6] PUT gs_Connections[3][7], gs_Connections[3][8], gs_Connections[3][9]
PUT ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4-ConLength_4, ConPosZ_4 PUT gs_Connections[4][4], gs_Connections[4][5], gs_Connections[4][6] PUT gs_Connections[4][7], gs_Connections[4][8], gs_Connections[4][9]
PUT ConPosX_3, 0, 0
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] NEXT cnum
! --------------------- ! ! --- Set Side Flag --- ! ! --------------------- !
MEP_EmptySideID = 1 IF SGN(dZz) = -1 THEN MEP_EmptySideID = 3 PARAMETERS MEP_EmptySideID = MEP_EmptySideID
! ---------------------------- ! ! --- Top and Bottom Level --- ! ! ---------------------------- !
z = MEP_Position[1][3] + MEP_Position[2][3]*MEP_StraightLength/2 PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[][2]
pID = 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(A) "+`Длина` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "MEP_StraightLength"
pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(B) "+`Длина Соединения` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "ConLength_3"
pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(C) "+`Основная Ширина` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "ConWidth_1"
pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(D) "+`Ширина Отвода` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "ConWidth_3"
pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(E) "+`Высота` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "ConDepth_1"
IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = "(F) "+`Радиус` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "MEP_CrossRadius" ENDIF
pID = pID + 1 ui_set_str[pID][1] = `Крышка` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "MEP_CoveredCableTray"
DIM ui_set_attr[][9] FOR i = 2 TO pID+1 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 48 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 22
ui_set_attr[pID+1][3] = 1
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 8
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 1 ui_con_type[2] = 3 ui_con_type[3] = 3 ui_con_type[4] = 3
DIM ui_sep_attr[2][5] ui_sep_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_sep_attr[1][2] = 200 ui_sep_attr[1][3] = 44 ui_sep_attr[1][4] = 200 ui_sep_attr[1][5] = 252
ui_sep_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_sep_attr[2][2] = 15 ui_sep_attr[2][3] = 191 ui_sep_attr[2][4] = 190 ui_sep_attr[2][5] = 191
pict_id = MEP_CrossTypeID + 2*MEP_CoveredCableTray
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 1, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_sep_attr = ui_sep_attr, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT pict_id, 25, 48, 156, 136, 1
UI_INFIELD{3} "MEP_CrossTypeID", 15, 201, 175, 50, 2, 5, 2, 1, 50, 50, 40, 40, 1,CrossTypeStr_dim[1],1, 2,CrossTypeStr_dim[2],2 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Cable Ladder Cross
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
VALUES "MEP_EmptySideID" 1, 2, 3, 4 VALUES "MEP_CrossType" CrossTypeStr_dim VALUES "MEP_CrossTypeID" 1, 2 IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "gs_CableTrayMat" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
gs_ui = 1
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_4" THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_4 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ELSE ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_CrossTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE(0, ] VALUES "MEP_CrossRadius" RANGE(0, ] VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE[MEP_CrossRadius, ] VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE[MEP_CrossRadius, ] VALUES "MEP_StraightLength" RANGE[ConWidth_3+MEP_CrossRadius*2, ] ELSE VALUES "MEP_StraightLength" RANGE(ConWidth_3, ] VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE(0, ] VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE(0, ] HIDEPARAMETER "MEP_CrossRadius" ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConLength_4" THEN ConLength_3 = ConLength_4 PARAMETERS ConLength_3 = ConLength_3 ELSE ConLength_4 = ConLength_3 PARAMETERS ConLength_4 = ConLength_4 ENDIF ELSE IDIRTYBIT = 10 for iConn = 1 to MEP_NumberConnections ! look for the changed connection IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn][IDIRTYBIT]) > EPS THEN for iConn2 = 1 to MEP_NumberConnections ! reset all others to the changed one MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn][13] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn2][13] next iConn2 MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn][IDIRTYBIT] = 0 PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn][IDIRTYBIT] = MEP_NumConnectionData[iConn][IDIRTYBIT] ENDIF next iConn ENDIF
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Основное 1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0 ConLength_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, gs_ui = gs_ui, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, MEP_cline_show = MEP_cline_show
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Основное 2`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 !! ConType_2 = ConType_1 !! PARAMETERS ConType_2 = ConType_2 !! MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
ConPosX_2 = MEP_StraightLength PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = 0 ConLength_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2 ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2 MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, gs_ui = gs_ui, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][3] = "0"
! --- 3nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Отвод 1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 !! ConType_3 = ConType_1 !! PARAMETERS ConType_3 = ConType_3 !! MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21]
ConPosX_3 = MEP_StraightLength/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = ConPosX_3 ConPosY_3 = ConWidth_1/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ConPosZ_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3 MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, gs_ui = gs_ui, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][3] = "0"
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Отвод 2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConDepth_4 !! ConType_4 = ConType_1 !! PARAMETERS ConType_4 = ConType_4 !! MEP_NumConnectionData[4][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[4][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[4][21]
ConPosX_4 = MEP_StraightLength/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_4 = ConPosX_4 ConPosY_4 = -ConWidth_1/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = ConPosY_4 ConPosZ_4 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = ConPosZ_4 ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4 MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[4][2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, gs_ui = gs_ui, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[4][3] = "0"
IF SetProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
! --- uploading of MEP_NumConnectionData
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) ad = 0 IF i < 4 THEN ad = MEP_Position[1][i] MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)]+ad PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
HIDEPARAMETER "Rotation"
! ! ---------------------- ! ! ! --- object rotator --- ! ! ! ---------------------- ! ! !IF rot_conn THEN ! ! IF rot_conn = 1 THEN ! dist_x = gs_Connections[3][1]+gs_Connections[3][23]*gs_Connections[3][4] ! dist_y = gs_Connections[3][2] ! ELSE ! DIM inCoords[20][3] ! DIM outCoords[20][3] ! ! DIM cMatrix[3][3] ! ! cMatrix[1][1] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][4] ! cMatrix[1][2] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][5] ! cMatrix[1][3] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][6] ! ! cMatrix[2][1] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][7] ! cMatrix[2][2] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][8] ! cMatrix[2][3] = gs_Connections[rot_conn][9] ! ! cMatrix[3][1] = -cMatrix[2][2]*cMatrix[1][3]+cMatrix[2][3]*cMatrix[1][2] ! cMatrix[3][2] = -cMatrix[2][3]*cMatrix[1][1]+cMatrix[2][1]*cMatrix[1][3] ! cMatrix[3][3] = -cMatrix[2][1]*cMatrix[1][2]+cMatrix[2][2]*cMatrix[1][1] ! ! ! DIM tMatrix[3][3] ! ! tMatrix[1][1] = cMatrix[1][1] ! tMatrix[1][2] = cMatrix[2][1] ! tMatrix[1][3] = cMatrix[3][1] ! ! tMatrix[2][1] = cMatrix[1][2] ! tMatrix[2][2] = cMatrix[2][2] ! tMatrix[2][3] = cMatrix[3][2] ! ! tMatrix[3][1] = cMatrix[1][3] ! tMatrix[3][2] = cMatrix[2][3] ! tMatrix[3][3] = cMatrix[3][3] ! ! ! !!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!! ! ! cx = gs_Connections[rot_conn][1]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][4] ! cy = gs_Connections[rot_conn][2]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][5] ! cz = gs_Connections[rot_conn][3]+gs_Connections[rot_conn][23]*gs_Connections[rot_conn][6] ! ! PUT cx, cy, cz ! ! Coordinates = NSP/3 ! ! FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates ! inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) ! inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) ! inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) ! NEXT cnum ! ! ! ! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates ! ! FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates ! outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] ! outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] ! outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] ! NEXT cnum ! ! dist_x = outCoords[1][1] ! dist_y = outCoords[1][2] ! ENDIF ! ! CALL "MEP_m_object_rotator" PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn, ! MEP_Position = MEP_Position, ! dist_x = dist_x, ! dist_y = dist_y, ! Rotation = Rotation, ! symbRotangle = SYMB_ROTANGLE, ! gs_Connections = gs_Connections, ! MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, ! MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, ! MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData, ! defaultMatrix = defaultMatrix !ENDIF
Symbol.Comment: Крестовина каркаса для кабеля с радиальным или угловым типом Т-сочленения и дополнительным покрытием.
